channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-3207] ContextNotActiveException: WELD-001303: No active contexts for scope type javax.faces.flow.builder.FlowDefinition on reload
item.description:
Deploy JSF application and reload the server (:reload from CLI).

item.summary: ContextNotActiveException: WELD-001303: No active contexts for scope type javax.faces.flow.builder.FlowDefinition on reload

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please attach a reproducer app (just tried reproducing this but I wasn't able to).
Really just https://github.com/clusterbench/clusterbench does the job on WildFly master – build it, deploy to server, connect via CLI and do :reload.
Seems like a lot of people ran into the issue but I couldn't see any Jira report.
